Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBadge
    This is the screen where the user adds a new badge to the Badge table in the database by entering data into a form.
    AddScout
    This is the screen where the user adds a new scout to the Scouts table in the database by entering data into a form.
    Badge
    This class represents a record in the Badges table from the database
    BadgeManagement
    This is the screen which the user visits to select a badge management option.
    Badges
    This screen will first display a list of badges in the database which can be selected.
    DeleteBadge
    This is the screen where the user deletes a badge from the database.
    DeleteScout
    This is the screen where the user deletes a scout from the database.
    EmailAddresses
    The class' only constructor has a JFrame as an argument which is passed from the report screen.
    EmergencyContactSheet
    The class' only constructor has a JFrame as an argument which is passed from the report screen.
    ListLayout
    This class extends GridLayout and provides an interface for displaying names in columns which are filled top-bottom rather than the default behaviour of filling across the row
    Register
    This is the screen which the user visits to generate a register from the database.
    Reports
    This is the screen which the user visits to select a report to be generated from the database.
    Scout
    This class represents a record in the Scouts table from the database
    ScoutManagement
    This is the screen which the user visits to select a scout management option.
    ScoutManager
    This is the main program for the Scout Manager project and creates the home screen which is first encountered by the user when application is started
    UpdateBadge
    This screen will first display a list of badges in the database which can be selected.
    UpdateScout
    This screen will first display a list of scouts in the database which can be selected.
    Validator
    This class contains methods for validating user input from forms throughout the system.
